step.description: Reviewed requirements and started Poll Analytics Dashboard feature.
Checked existing folder structure and created missing files/folders for analytics dashboard.
Reviewed Supabase client setup and authentication context for secure analytics queries.
Implemented secure Supabase queries for poll analytics in lib/analytics/getPollAnalytics.ts.
Connected dashboard UI to analytics data, added error handling, loading states, and empty states for all analytics components.
Previewed the analytics dashboard and verified UI/UX, error handling, and data connectivity.
Refactored lib/analytics/getPollAnalytics.ts, updated lib/analytics/types.ts, and adjusted PollAnalyticsCard.tsx and PollStats.tsx to align with new type definitions and display vote percentages.
